abstracts.cdata!:
This is a statement by Yahya Alyahya at
            the meeting of June 21, 2001 concerning the Country
            Assistance Strategy progress report, the Bank Restructuring
            Facility Adjustment Loan, and the Third Basic Health Care
            (Procedes) Project for Mexico.
